title: Historian Alert Schema
description: Schema for drift alert memory injection

loop_id.description: Identifier of the loop that triggered the alert

alert_type.description: Type of alert generated by the historian agent

missing_beliefs.description: List of beliefs that haven't been referenced in recent loops

loop_belief_alignment_score.description: Score between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating alignment between loop summary and system beliefs

suggestion.description: Suggested action based on the alignment score and missing beliefs

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 datetime when the alert was generated
